meanings.definition: The act of purging or cleansing.
meanings.sent1: After the meal, the purgings of the body helped him feel better.
meanings.sent2: The purgings of the toxins from the system were necessary for her health.
meanings.sent3: The purgings of the clutter in her room made her feel lighter and happier.
meanings.sent4: Her purgings of negative thoughts were like a refreshing rain washing away the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The purgings of the old habits were like a fresh start in a new chapter of life.

meanings.definition: The result of purging or cleansing.
meanings.sent1: The purgings of the body after the cleanse were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: She felt relieved after the purgings of the toxins from her system.
meanings.sent3: The purgings of the pantry left her with only the essentials.
meanings.sent4: The purgings of the past mistakes were like a weight lifted off her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The purgings of the old ways opened up space for new possibilities.
